thread.title: KFC pisses off everyone on Twitter with healthy cauliflower burger (9 Photos)
thread.title_full: KFC pisses off everyone on Twitter with healthy cauliflower burger (9 Photos)

author: Kayla
title: KFC pisses off everyone on Twitter with healthy cauliflower burger (9 Photos)
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
KFC pulled the ultimate prank on fans and it’s not even April Fools’ Day. Earlier this week they announced via Twitter that they are going to start serving a new “clean eating” burger complete with a cauliflower bun and and ice cube relish. KFC created this fake, health nut “food blogger” named Figgy Poppleton-Rice to promote the burger. Based on her Twitter, I already dislike her and her vegan-isms so way to make it believable KFC. 2 3 
I wouldn’t touch this thing if I was on a deserted island and it’s the first thing I saw in a week. 
People on Twitter actually fell for it and they are losing their minds. Check out the best tweet replies: 4
